blog.name: quirk-concepts
blog.title: quirk: ???
blog.description: bnha quirk ideas! feel free to use them, no credit needed. you can submit quirks or ask for custom ones if you want, too! (instagram: quirk.ideas)

summary: Do you have any quirk ideas that might help a phantom thief with heists?
question: Do you have any quirk ideas that might help a phantom thief with heists?
answer:
<b>Contortionist</b>: the user can contort and fold their body down into various tools and objects. This allows them to hide in plain sight, as well as aid allies by taking the form of tools like keys or weapons. Using this quirk too much can cause the user’s joints to become stiff

<b>Shroud</b>: the user can project an area of invisibility around them that extends for 2-3 meters. Anyone inside this radius, including the user, is rendered invisible to anyone outside of it. However, this effect also applies to enemies, allowing them to view the user if they wander too close. As such, this makes the quirk nearly useless in crowded areas.

<b>Glitch</b>: the user can alter their presence in a recording, both audio and visual. This allows them to manipulate camera feeds to display false information, making it a useful quirk for crime/heists.

-mod jinzler

tags: alternatively since all might offered ofa to midoriya after barely knowing him
he decides to google midoriya to get to know him better
summary: i want to read a crack fic where class 1a discovers deku's youtube channel, but it's all in the style of polygon's unraveled...
body:
i want to read a crack fic where class 1a discovers deku’s youtube channel, but it’s all in the style of polygon’s unraveled series but only focused on heroes. 

“solving the all might timeline in 15 minutes" 

"no one asked by i found hero society’s best cuddler”

“Endeavour owes millions of dollars in OSHA violations”

“Scientifically calculating the hero of the year" 

"i read all 377 books on all might so you don’t have to”

summary: Boku no Hero Academia Pride icons I felt like I should do sth for Pride month, so I made a set of different pride icons of 8 of...
caption:
Boku no Hero Academia Pride icons

I felt like I should do sth for Pride month, so I made a set of different pride icons of 8 of my fav BNHA characters. MAYBE I’ll do more, depends on how you guys like these.

All icons are 200x200 in size
MUST CREDIT me in bio WHEN USED!

Download link: http://bit.ly/2XnBco5

Please reblog if you can and enjoy pride month!!

tags: here's chapter 7 after a small eternity! I hope you enjoy
summary:
"An interview, huh?" Ochako raises
her voice to project above the noise. "That's very kind of you." Chapter 7 of The Quirk...
caption:
“An interview, huh?” Ochako raises her voice to project above the noise. “That’s very kind of you.”

Chapter 7 of The Quirk Thief, my bnha longfic, is out! Ochako and her friend do a favor for their host, dredging up old memories in the process. 

Premise: Uraraka Ochako goes back in time. OfA!Ochako, Vigilante!Ochako

blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Festa do pecado
description:
by Cherry_exe

Basicamente são adolescentes alcoólatras (exceto Iida e Izuku, pq se Izuku beber ele terá uma morte prematura e Iida nunca irá se perdoar) E são adolescentes suicidas falando para adolescentes suicidas que suicídio não é uma opção (Deus, que humor de merda)
Avisos: Neste AU, Izuku é filho de Aizawa e Hizashi e irmão de Shinsou (ele não estava na classe 1-A antes pq não tinha vagas) e eu sou uma idiota pra este tipo de AU
É apenas um chat fic pq é a única coisa que eu sei fazer

Words: 28, Chapters: 1/?, Language: Português brasileiro

blog.description: Sup! I'm Pheo (she/her) and I write oneshots/drabbles/headcanons for BNHA/MHA!  Please check my rules before submitting! REQUESTS ARE OPEN Masterlist

summary: Okay so with the Pretty Face headcanons, how would the LOV deal with when the reader is actually trying to fluster them?? Let’s...
question: Okay so with the Pretty Face headcanons, how would the LOV deal with when the reader is actually trying to fluster them?? Let’s say reader gives Shigaraki a kiss on the cheek or gives dabi a small hug etc?? What do they do how do they deal???
answer:
Deadass made “pretty face” a tag yEET. May we follow the journey of Pretty Face to the very end.

🎱You can’t make Dabi flustered. It is, quite frankly, impossible. You hug him? Oh he’ll hug you right back and squeeze you for good measure, hands a little too low for comfort. Try to whisper in his ear during missions and put your hands on his shoulders? He’ll do the same to you and then some. You’ll entire an entire flirting war, and there’s no way to win that lemme tell you.

🎱Shigaraki is another story entirely. If you sit next to him when he’s not wearing Father and peck him on the cheek he’ll leap up to his feet like you burned him, facing away from you. His shoulders will be shaking and for a moment you’d be scared you pissed him off. In reality? He’s blushing and can’t hide it. Becomes a normal thing for him to always wear Father when around you or constantly make sure there’s at least a five foot distance between you.

🎱Twice- oh boy, my lad Twice. You can’t quite fluster the lad but if you give him a lil’ smooch during a fight when he’s tired suddenly he’s on overdrive. Was he slumped over by a tree saying he can’t keep fighting? Surprise, now he’s magically fighting every single person on the entire Earth without breaking a sweat. He’ll puff out his chest and try to impress you and constantly be asking “Did you see that?” “Did you see what I just did? Do I need to do it again? I’ll do it again.”

🎱Spinner- oh god please don’t tease Spinner. You’ll kill him. You will actually murder him. He’s blush and genuinely stop fighting mid battle if you send a compliment his way, resulting in him just getting decked in the face. If you try to do it when you hang out he’ll probably choke on his food or spit out his drink. Will constantly do his best to please you to get more compliments but probably ends up screwing up more shit than intended if otherwise.

🎱Toga is immune. She’s literally immune. Yeah, you’re cute but guess what? So is she! If you try to tease her she’ll probably just giggle and bat you away jokingly, a lil’ blush on her cheeks. Acts like the literal school girl she is. “Oh, stop it (Y/n)-chan!” She’s a more innocent and toned down version of Dabi in this situation really, sending flirtatious compliments right back your way. She’s probably playfully cut you at one point while licking the blade with a lil’ wink.

blog.name: bnhasource
blog.title: BNHA SOURCE
blog.description: ☆ Welcome to BNHA Source!  We are a fansite dedicated to the animanga Boku No Hero Academia created by Kōhei Horikoshi. Here you will find artworks and edits of the anime and manga, along with news updates. We track the tag #bnhasource and #bnhaedit. ♥
